name: 2020: A Space Odyssey
description:
2020: A Space Odyssey

You've discovered a space station without power, you will need to work with your robot buddy to collect the tools required to get things working again! However there's a catch, you and your buddy need to share your own power to stay active. So you are both joined by a power cable which can get stuck on all sorts of things!

Controls

2020: A Space Odyssey can be played either solo or with a friend!

Blue Robot: Hold A to charge and move in the direction of the arrow.

Red Robot: Hold L to charge and move in the direction of the arrow.

Development Team

Oliwia Janczewska - Art

Lucho Hubanov - Code

Nick Stacey - Code

Stephen Paice - Code

Kev Davey - Narrative & Sound Design

Alyx Jones - Narrative & Music

Lorraine Ansell - Voice of Robots
